00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     PagingLandScapePageManager::PagingLandScapePageManager(PagingLandScapeSceneManager * scnMgr) :
00050         mSceneManager(scnMgr),
00051         mOptions(scnMgr->getOptions()),
00052         mData2d(scnMgr->getData2DManager()),
00053         mTexture(scnMgr->getTextureManager()),
00054         mRenderablesMgr(scnMgr->getRenderableManager()),
00055         mWidth(0),
00056         mHeight(0),
00057         mNextQueueFrameCount(0),
00058             mPause(99),
00059         mCurrentcam(0),
00060         mTerrainReady(false),
00061         mTimePreLoaded(0),
00062         mRenderQueueGroupID (RENDER_QUEUE_WORLD_GEOMETRY_2),
00063                 mPageLoadInterval (mOptions->PageLoadInterval),
00064                 mOnFrame(false),
00065         mEnabled(false)
00066     {
00067                 mPagePool.clear();
00068                 mActivePages.clear();
00069                 mFreePages.clear();
00070     }
00071     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072     PagingLandScapePageManager::~PagingLandScapePageManager(void)
00073     {
00074                 reset();
00075                 // could save a delete if texture type is the same... ?
00076                 if (!mPagePool.empty())
00077                 {
00078                         std::for_each (mPagePool.begin (), mPagePool.end (), 
00079                                                         delete_object ());
00080                         mPagePool.clear();
00081                         mFreePages.clear();
00082                 }
00083     }
00084     //----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00085     void PagingLandScapePageManager::reset(void)
00086     {   
00087                 std::for_each(mActivePages.begin(), mActivePages.end(), 
00088                         std::mem_fun(&PagingLandScapePage::uninit));
00089 
00090                 // Insert actives into free list
00091                 mFreePages.insert(mFreePages.end(), mActivePages.begin(), mActivePages.end());
00092                 // Remove all active instances
00093                 mActivePages.clear(); 
00094 
00095                 mPageLoadQueue.clear();
00096                 mPagePreloadQueue.clear();
00097                 mPageTextureloadQueue.clear();
00098 
00099                 mLoadedPages.clear();
00100                 mTextureLoadedPages.clear();
00101                 mPreLoadedPages.clear();
00102 
00103         mWidth = 0;
00104         mHeight = 0;
00105                 mOnFrame = false;
00106         mEnabled = false;
00107     }
00108     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00109     void PagingLandScapePageManager::load(void)
00110     {
00111         WorldDimensionChange ();
00112         mEnabled = true;
00113     }
00114     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115     void PagingLandScapePageManager::clear(void)
00116     {
00117         // before calling the scene manager node clearing
00118                 reset();
00119     }
00120     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     void PagingLandScapePageManager::WorldDimensionChange(void)
00122     {
00123         const unsigned int newWidth = mOptions->world_width; 
00124         const unsigned int newHeight = mOptions->world_height;
00125 
00126                 reset();
00127 
00128                 mPageLoadInterval = mOptions->PageLoadInterval;
00129         mWidth = newWidth; 
00130         mHeight = newHeight;
00131     }
00132     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00133     void PagingLandScapePageManager::setMapMaterial(void)
00134     {
00135         std::for_each(mActivePages.begin(), mActivePages.end(), 
00136                                         std::mem_fun(&PagingLandScapePage::setMapMaterial));
00137     }
00138     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00139     void PagingLandScapePageManager::_updateLod(void)
00140     {
00141         PagingLandScapePageList::iterator lend = mLoadedPages.end();
00142         for (PagingLandScapePageList::iterator l = mLoadedPages.begin(); l != lend; ++l)
00143         { 
00144             (*l)->_updateLod();
00145         }
00146     }
00147     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00148     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt)
00149     {
00150         if (mEnabled)//if not queued to be removed from framelistener or Paused
00151         {
00152             --mTimePreLoaded;
00153             if (mOptions->VisMap)
00154             {
00155                 mSceneManager->getHorizon ()->prepare(static_cast< PagingLandScapeCamera* >(mOptions->primaryCamera));
00156             }
00157                         mOnFrame = false;
00158                 }
00159         return true;
00160     }
00161     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00162     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::frameEnded(const FrameEvent& evt)
00163     {
00164         // mOnFrame If This Frame has seen any Camera,
00165         // We won't unload anything.
00166         // since un-focusing rendering may make this method unload all renderables.
00167         // mEnabled sm paused or frame listener queued for deletion
00168         if (!mOnFrame || !mEnabled)
00169             return true;
00170 
00171                 // unload some pages if no more in use
00172                 processUnloadQueues();
00173         if (!mTerrainReady && 
00174             mPagePreloadQueue.empty() && 
00175             mPageLoadQueue.empty() && 
00176             mPageTextureloadQueue.empty())
00177         {
00178             mSceneManager->getListenerManager()->fireTerrainReady();// no more to load
00179                         mTerrainReady = true;
00180         }
00181 
00182         if (mOptions->VisMap)
00183             mSceneManager->getHorizon()->update();
00184 
00185                 mRenderablesMgr->resetVisibles();
00186         return true;
00187     }
00188         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00189         PagingLandScapePage *PagingLandScapePageManager::getNewPage(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z)
00190         {
00191                 PagingLandScapePage *p;
00192 
00193                 // should we resize page pool
00194                 if (mFreePages.empty())
00195                 {
00196                         const size_t pool_size = mPagePool.size ();                     
00197                         const size_t new_pool_size = (pool_size == 0) ? 9 : pool_size * 2;
00198 
00199                         mPagePool.reserve(new_pool_size);
00200                         mPagePool.resize(new_pool_size);
00201 
00202                         // Create new pages
00203                         for (size_t i = pool_size; i < new_pool_size; ++i)
00204                         {
00205                                 p = new PagingLandScapePage (this);
00206                                 mPagePool[i] = p;
00207                                 mFreePages.push_back (p);
00208                         }
00209                 }
00210 
00211                 // Get a pre-allocated new page.
00212                 p = mFreePages.front ();
00213                 mFreePages.pop_front ();
00214                 mActivePages.push_back (p); 
00215 
00216                 p->init (x, z);
00217 
00218                 return p;
00219         }
00220         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00221         void PagingLandScapePageManager::releasePage(PagingLandScapePage *p)
00222         {
00223                 removeFromQueues (p);
00224                 p->uninit ();
00225                 mActivePages.remove (p);
00226                 mFreePages.push_back (p);
00227         }
00228         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00229         PagingLandScapePage *PagingLandScapePageManager::getPage(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z,
00230                                                                                                                          const bool alwaysReturn)
00231         {
00232                 if (x < mWidth && z < mHeight)
00233                 {
00234                         if (!mActivePages.empty())
00235                         {
00236                                 PagingLandScapePageList::iterator l, lend = mActivePages.end();
00237                                 for (l = mActivePages.begin(); l != lend; ++l)
00238                                 {
00239                                         if ((*l)->isCoord(x, z))
00240                                                 return (*l);
00241                                 }
00242                         }
00243                         if (alwaysReturn)
00244                                 return getNewPage(x, z);
00245                 }
00246                 assert (!alwaysReturn);
00247                 return 0;
00248         }
00249     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00250     void PagingLandScapePageManager::LoadFirstPage(PagingLandScapeCamera* cam)
00251     {           
00252 
00253                 const Vector3 CamPos =  cam->getDerivedPosition();
00254                 //gets page indices (if outside Terrain gets nearest page)
00255                 unsigned int i, j;
00256             getPageIndices  (CamPos.x, CamPos.z, i, j, true);        
00257                 // update the camera page position
00258         // does modify mIniX, mFinX, mIniZ, mFinZ
00259 
00260                 PagingLandScapePage *p = getPage (i, j);
00261                 makePageLoadedNow (p);
00262         }
00263         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00264         void PagingLandScapePageManager::makePageLoadedNow(PagingLandScapePage * p)
00265         {
00266                 // Have the current page be loaded now !
00267                 if (!p->isLoaded())
00268                 {
00269                     // remove from lists it does belongs to
00270                     if (p->isTextureLoaded())
00271                             mTextureLoadedPages.remove (p);
00272                     else if (p->isPreLoaded())
00273                             mPreLoadedPages.remove (p);
00274                     // remove from queue it does belongs to
00275                         removeFromQueues (p);      
00276                         
00277                         p->load();
00278                         assert ( std::find(mLoadedPages.begin(), mLoadedPages.end(), p) == mLoadedPages.end());
00279                         mLoadedPages.push_back (p);
00280                         // make sure this brutal loading doesn't impact on fps
00281                         mNextQueueFrameCount = mPageLoadInterval;   
00282                 }
00283                 else
00284                 {
00285                         p->touch ();   
00286                 }
00287         }
00288 
00289         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00290         void PagingLandScapePageManager::updateLoadedPages()
00291         {
00292                 PagingLandScapeCamera *cam = mCurrentcam;
00293                 const Vector3 pos (cam->getDerivedPosition().x, 127.0f,cam->getDerivedPosition().z);
00294                 // hide page not visible by this Camera
00295                 // Notify those Page (update tile vis/ rend load on cam distance)
00296                 // update Page Texture if needed
00297 
00298                 const unsigned int iniX = cam->mIniX;
00299                 const unsigned int finX = cam->mFinX;
00300 
00301                 const unsigned int iniZ = cam->mIniZ;
00302                 const unsigned int finZ = cam->mFinZ;
00303 
00304                 PagingLandScapePage *p;
00305                 const bool lightchange = mOptions->lightmoved;
00306                 PagingLandScapePageList::iterator l, lend = mLoadedPages.end ();
00307                 for (l = mLoadedPages.begin (); l != lend; ++l)
00308                 {
00309                         p = (*l);
00310                         unsigned int x, z;
00311                         p->getCoordinates (x, z);
00312                         if ((z >= iniZ) && (z <= finZ) && (x >= iniX) && (x <= finX))
00313                         {
00314                                 // inform pages we are near Camera on next render.
00315                                 if (p->_Notify (pos, cam))
00316                                 {
00317                                         // get pages that needs modification and Are visible..                 
00318                                         PagingLandScapeTexture * const tex = mTexture->getTexture(x, z);
00319                                         assert(tex);
00320                                         if (lightchange)
00321                                                 tex->lightUpdate();
00322                                         if (tex->needUpdate())
00323                                                 tex->update();
00324                                 }
00325                         }
00326                         else
00327                         {
00328                                 p->_Show (false);
00329                         }
00330                 } 
00331 
00332 
00333 
00334                 mSceneManager->getTileManager ()->updateLoadedTiles();
00335                 if (lightchange)
00336                         mOptions->lightmoved = false;
00337         }
00338         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00339         void PagingLandScapePageManager::loadNow(PagingLandScapeCamera *cam)
00340         {
00341             updatePaging (cam);
00342             const Vector3 pos (cam->getDerivedPosition().x, 127.0f, cam->getDerivedPosition().z);
00343             while (!mTerrainReady || 
00344                 !mPagePreloadQueue.empty() || 
00345                 !mPageLoadQueue.empty() || 
00346                 !mPageTextureloadQueue.empty())
00347         {
00348                     processLoadQueues();// fill pages queues
00349                     updateLoadedPages();// fill tiles queues
00350                         mTerrainReady = mRenderablesMgr->executeRenderableLoading(pos); // load renderables
00351                         mNextQueueFrameCount = -1;
00352         }
00353         //assert ()
00354         }
00355         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00356         void PagingLandScapePageManager::queuePageNeighbors()
00357         {
00358                 const PagingLandScapeCamera * const cam = mCurrentcam;
00359                 // Queue the rest                               
00360                 // Loading  must be done one by one to avoid FPS drop, so they are queued.
00361                 // We must load the next visible LandScape pages, 
00362                 // check the LandScape boundaries       
00363 
00364                 const unsigned int preIniX = cam->mPreIniX;
00365                 const unsigned int preFinX = cam->mPreFinX;
00366 
00367                 const unsigned int preIniZ = cam->mPreIniZ;
00368                 const unsigned int preFinZ = cam->mPreFinZ;
00369 
00370                 const unsigned int iniX = cam->mIniX;
00371                 const unsigned int finX = cam->mFinX;
00372 
00373                 const unsigned int iniZ = cam->mIniZ;
00374                 const unsigned int finZ = cam->mFinZ;
00375 
00376                 PagingLandScapePage *p;
00377                 for (unsigned int i = preIniX; i <= preFinX; i++)
00378                 {
00379                         for (unsigned int j = preIniZ; j <= preFinZ; j++)
00380                         {
00381                                 // pages here, in this zone around camera,
00382                                 // must be at least preloading. 
00383                                 // that means they can be loaded too.
00384                                 p = getPage (i, j, true);
00385 
00386                                 if (!(p->mIsLoading || p->isLoaded()))
00387                                 {                        
00388                                         if((j >= iniZ) && (j <= finZ) && (i >= iniX) && (i <= finX))
00389                                         {
00390                                                 // pages here, in this tighter zone around camera,
00391                                                 // must be Loading or Loaded as they may 
00392                                                 // be below camera very soon.
00393                                                 removeFromQueues (p);
00394                                                 mPageLoadQueue.push (p);                            
00395                                                 p->mIsLoading = true;
00396                                         }
00397                                         else if (!p->mIsTextureLoading && 
00398                                                  !p->isTextureLoaded() && 
00399                                                  !p->mIsPreLoading &&
00400                                                  !p->isPreLoaded())
00401                                         {
00402                                             //  must be at least preloading. 
00403                                                 removeFromQueues (p);
00404                                                 mPagePreloadQueue.push (p);                    
00405                                                 p->mIsPreLoading = true;        
00406                                         }
00407                                 }
00408                                 p->touch ();
00409                         }
00410                 }
00411                 mTimePreLoaded = mPageLoadInterval;
00412         }
00413     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00414     void PagingLandScapePageManager::updatePaging(PagingLandScapeCamera *cam)
00415     {
00416         mCurrentcam = cam;
00417             // Here we have to look if we have to load, unload any of the LandScape Pages
00418             // Fix from Praetor, so the camera used gives you "world-relative" coordinates
00419         // make sure in the bounding box of LandScape   
00420             const Vector3 pos (cam->getDerivedPosition().x, 
00421                                 127.0f, 
00422                                 cam->getDerivedPosition().z);
00423 
00424             //updateStats(pos);
00425 
00426                 bool need_touch = (mTimePreLoaded < 0);
00427         
00428             if (cam->mLastCameraPos != pos
00429                         && (mOptions->cameraThreshold < fabs (cam->mLastCameraPos.x - pos.x) ||
00430                                 mOptions->cameraThreshold < fabs (cam->mLastCameraPos.z - pos.z)))
00431                 {       
00432                         // Update only if the camera was moved
00433                         PagingLandScapePage * const oldPage = getPage (cam->mCurrentCameraPageX, cam->mCurrentCameraPageZ, false);
00434                         PagingLandScapeTile * const oldTile = (oldPage && oldPage->isLoaded() ?
00435                                                                                                         oldPage->getTile (cam->mCurrentCameraTileX, cam->mCurrentCameraTileZ) : 0);
00436 
00437                         unsigned int i, j;
00438 
00439                         //gets page indices (if outside Terrain gets nearest page)
00440                         getPageIndices (pos.x, pos.z, i, j, true); 
00441                         PagingLandScapePage *p = getPage (i, j);
00442                         makePageLoadedNow (p);
00443 
00444                         // update current Cam Page info 
00445                         if (oldPage != p)
00446                         {
00447                                 // update the camera info :
00448                                 cam->updatePaging(i, j); 
00449                                 // need to inform neighbors pages 
00450                                 need_touch = true;
00451                         }
00452 
00453                         // Update current Cam Tile info.
00454                         if (p->isLoadable())
00455                         {       
00456                                 PagingLandScapeTile * const t = getTile (pos.x, pos.z, i, j, true);
00457                                 if (t && t != oldTile)
00458                                 {
00459                                         if (mOptions->MaxLodUnderCam)
00460                                         {
00461                                                 // reset previous tile at normal LOD mechanism.
00462                                                 if (oldTile && oldTile->isLoaded())
00463                                                 {
00464                                                         assert (oldTile->getRenderable());
00465                                                         oldTile->getRenderable()->setMaxLod (false);
00466                                                 }    
00467                                                 // set current tile at max LOD whatever complexity it is.
00468                                                 if (t->isLoaded())
00469                                                 {
00470                                                         assert (t->getRenderable());
00471                                                         t->getRenderable()->setMaxLod (true);
00472                                                 }   
00473                                         }
00474 
00475                                         PagingLandScapeTileInfo * const CurrentTileInfo  = t->getInfo();
00476                                         cam->mCurrentCameraTileX = CurrentTileInfo->mTileX;
00477                                         cam->mCurrentCameraTileZ = CurrentTileInfo->mTileZ;                                     
00478                                 }
00479                         }
00480                         // Update the last camera position
00481                         if (mOptions->cameraThreshold < fabs (cam->mLastCameraPos.x - pos.x))
00482                                 cam->mLastCameraPos.x = pos.x;   
00483                         if (mOptions->cameraThreshold < fabs (cam->mLastCameraPos.z - pos.z))
00484                                 cam->mLastCameraPos.z = pos.z;   
00485         }
00486                 
00487         if (need_touch) 
00488                         queuePageNeighbors();
00489         updateLoadedPages();
00490                 processLoadQueues();
00491                 //if (mNextQueueFrameCount < 0)
00492                         mRenderablesMgr->executeRenderableLoading(pos);
00493 
00494         // This Frame has seen a Camera.
00495         mOnFrame = true;
00496         }
00497         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00498         void PagingLandScapePageManager::processUnloadQueues()
00499         {
00500                 // Check for pages that need to be unloaded.
00501                 // if touched, that means they didn't have been touch by any cameras
00502                 // for several frames and thus need to be unloaded.
00503                 PagingLandScapePage *p;
00504                 // LIST CHECKS
00505                 PagingLandScapePageList::iterator itl;
00506                 for (itl = mPreLoadedPages.begin (); itl != mPreLoadedPages.end ();)
00507                 {
00508                         if ((*itl)->touched ())
00509                         {
00510                                 p = *itl;
00511                                 releasePage (p);
00512                                 itl = mPreLoadedPages.erase (itl); 
00513                         }
00514                         else
00515                         {
00516                                 ++itl;
00517                         }
00518                 }
00519                 for (itl = mTextureLoadedPages.begin (); itl != mTextureLoadedPages.end ();)
00520                 {
00521                         if ((*itl)->touched ())
00522                         {
00523                                 p = *itl;
00524                                 releasePage (p);
00525                                 itl = mTextureLoadedPages.erase (itl); 
00526                         }
00527                         else
00528                         {
00529                                 ++itl;
00530                         }
00531                 }
00532                 for (itl = mLoadedPages.begin (); itl != mLoadedPages.end ();)
00533                 {             
00534                         if ((*itl)->touched ())
00535                         {
00536                                 p = *itl;
00537                                 releasePage (p);
00538                                 itl = mLoadedPages.erase (itl); 
00539                         }
00540                         else
00541                         {
00542                                 ++itl;
00543                         }  
00544                 }
00545 
00546                 // QUEUES CHECKS
00547                 // check queues for page that need to be excluded from queues
00548                 PagingLandScapeQueue<PagingLandScapePage>::MsgQueType::iterator itq;
00549                 for (itq = mPagePreloadQueue.begin (); itq != mPagePreloadQueue.end ();)
00550                 {
00551                         assert (!(*itq)->isLoaded() && !(*itq)->isPreLoaded() && !(*itq)->isTextureLoaded());
00552                     assert (!(*itq)->mIsLoading && !(*itq)->mIsTextureLoading);
00553                         if ((*itq)->touched ())
00554                         {
00555                                 p = *itq;
00556                                 // remove from queue
00557                                 p->mIsPreLoading = false;
00558                                 itq = mPagePreloadQueue.erase (itq);
00559                                 // remove from active pages 
00560                                 //(must be removed from queue first)
00561                                 releasePage (p);  
00562                         }
00563                         else
00564                         {
00565                                 ++itq;
00566                         }
00567                 }
00568                 for (itq = mPageTextureloadQueue.begin(); itq != mPageTextureloadQueue.end();)
00569                 {
00570                         assert (!(*itq)->isLoaded() && (*itq)->isPreLoaded() && !(*itq)->isTextureLoaded());
00571                     assert (!(*itq)->mIsLoading && (*itq)->mIsTextureLoading && !(*itq)->mIsPreLoading);
00572                         if ((*itq)->touched ())
00573                         {
00574                                 p = *itq;
00575                                 // remove from queue
00576                                 p->mIsTextureLoading = false;
00577                                 itq = mPageTextureloadQueue.erase (itq); 
00578                                 // remove from active pages 
00579                                 //(must be removed from queue first)
00580                                 releasePage (p);  
00581                         }
00582                         else
00583                         {
00584                                 ++itq;
00585                         }
00586                 }
00587                 for (itq = mPageLoadQueue.begin (); itq != mPageLoadQueue.end ();)
00588                 {
00589                         assert (!(*itq)->isLoaded());
00590                     assert ((*itq)->mIsLoading && !(*itq)->mIsTextureLoading && !(*itq)->mIsPreLoading);
00591                         if ((*itq)->touched ())
00592                         {
00593                                 p = *itq;
00594                                 // remove from queue
00595                                 p->mIsLoading = false; 
00596                                 itq = mPageLoadQueue.erase (itq); 
00597                                 // remove from active pages 
00598                                 //(must be removed from queue first)                             
00599                                 releasePage (p);  
00600                         }
00601                         else
00602                         {
00603                                 ++itq;
00604                         }
00605                 }
00606         }
00607         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00608         void PagingLandScapePageManager::processLoadQueues()
00609         {
00610                 // Should be called every count frame only 
00611                 // to minimize fps impact
00612                 if (mNextQueueFrameCount-- < 0)
00613                 {
00614                         const Vector3 pos (mCurrentcam->getDerivedPosition().x, 
00615                                             127.0f, 
00616                                             mCurrentcam->getDerivedPosition().z);
00617 
00618                         //      We to Load nearest page in non-empty queue
00619                         if (!mPageLoadQueue.empty ())
00620                         {
00621                             //  We to Load nearest page in non-empty queue
00622                                 PagingLandScapePage *p = mPageLoadQueue.find_nearest (pos);
00623                 assert (p && !p->isLoaded ());
00624                 assert (!p->mIsTextureLoading && !p->mIsPreLoading);
00625                                 p->load ();
00626 
00627                                 p->mIsLoading = false;   
00628                                 mLoadedPages.push_back (p);
00629                                 mTextureLoadedPages.remove (p);
00630                                 mNextQueueFrameCount = mPageLoadInterval;
00631                         }
00632                         else if (!mPageTextureloadQueue.empty ())
00633                         {
00634                 //      We TextureLoad nearest page in non-empty queue
00635                                 PagingLandScapePage *p = mPageTextureloadQueue.find_nearest (pos);
00636                 assert (p && !p->isTextureLoaded());
00637                 assert (!p->mIsLoading && !p->mIsPreLoading);
00638                                 p->loadTexture ();
00639 
00640                                 p->mIsTextureLoading = false;   
00641                                 mTextureLoadedPages.push_back (p);
00642                                 mPreLoadedPages.remove (p);
00643                                 // do not automatically push to level up.
00644                                 //mPageLoadQueue.push (p);
00645                                 mNextQueueFrameCount = mPageLoadInterval;
00646                         }
00647                         else if (!mPagePreloadQueue.empty ())
00648                         {
00649                             //  We PreLoad nearest page in non-empty queue
00650                                 PagingLandScapePage *p = mPagePreloadQueue.find_nearest (pos);
00651                 assert (p && !p->isPreLoaded());
00652                 assert (!p->mIsLoading && !p->mIsTextureLoading);
00653                                 p->preload ();
00654 
00655                                 p->mIsPreLoading = false;
00656                                 mPreLoadedPages.push_back (p);
00657                                 mPageTextureloadQueue.push (p);
00658                                 p->mIsTextureLoading = true;
00659                                 mNextQueueFrameCount = mPageLoadInterval;
00660                         }
00661                 } // if (mNextQueueFrameCount-- < 0)
00662         }
00663     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00664     void PagingLandScapePageManager::removeFromQueues(PagingLandScapePage* p)
00665     {
00666                 assert (p);
00667         if (p->mIsLoading)
00668         {
00669             p->mIsLoading = false;
00670             mPageLoadQueue.remove (p);  
00671         }
00672         else if (p->mIsTextureLoading)
00673         {
00674             p->mIsTextureLoading = false;
00675                         mPageTextureloadQueue.remove (p);
00676         }
00677         else if (p->mIsPreLoading)
00678         {
00679             p->mIsPreLoading = false;
00680                         mPagePreloadQueue.remove (p);
00681         }
00682                 assert (!p->mIsLoading && !p->mIsTextureLoading && !p->mIsPreLoading);
00683     }

00768     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00769     void PagingLandScapePageManager::getGlobalToPage(Real& x, Real& z) const
00770     {
00771         const Real inv_pSize = 1.0f / (mOptions->PageSize - 1);
00772       
00773             x = static_cast< int >(((x / mOptions->scale.x) + mOptions->maxUnScaledX) * inv_pSize);
00774             z = static_cast< int >(((z / mOptions->scale.z) + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ) * inv_pSize);
00775     }
00776     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00777     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::getRealPageIndicesUnscaled(const Real posx, 
00778         const Real posz, unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z) const
00779     {
00780         const Real inv_pSize = 1.0f / (mOptions->PageSize - 1);
00781       
00782             const Real lx = ((posx + mOptions->maxUnScaledX) * inv_pSize);
00783             const Real lz = ((posz + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ) * inv_pSize);
00784 
00785             // make sure indices are not negative or outside range of number of pages
00786             if (lx >= mOptions->world_width || lx < 0.0f || 
00787                         lz >= mOptions->world_height || lz < 0.0f )
00788             {
00789                    return false;
00790             }
00791         else 
00792         {
00793             x = static_cast< unsigned int > (lx);
00794             z = static_cast< unsigned int > (lz);
00795             return true;
00796         }
00797     }
00798 
00799     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00800     void PagingLandScapePageManager::getNearestPageIndicesUnscaled(const Real posx, const Real posz, unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z) const
00801     {
00802         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00803         const Real inv_pSize = 1.0f / (mOptions->PageSize - 1);
00804       
00805             const int lx = static_cast< int >((posx + mOptions->maxUnScaledX) * inv_pSize);
00806             const int lz = static_cast< int >((posz + mOptions->maxUnScaledZ) * inv_pSize);
00807 
00808         const int w = static_cast< int >(mOptions->world_width);
00809         const int h = static_cast< int >(mOptions->world_height);
00810 
00811             // make sure indices are not negative or outside range of number of pages
00812             if (lx >= w)
00813             {
00814                     x = static_cast< unsigned int >(w - 1);
00815             }
00816         else if (lx < 0)
00817         {
00818             x = 0;
00819         }
00820         else
00821                 {
00822             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(lx);
00823                 }
00824 
00825             if (lz >= h) 
00826             {
00827                     z = static_cast< unsigned int >(h - 1);
00828             }
00829         else if (lz < 0)
00830         {
00831             z = 0;
00832         }
00833         else
00834                 {
00835             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(lz);
00836                 }
00837     }
00838 
00839     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00840     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::getPageIndices(const Real posx, const Real posz, unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z, bool alwaysAnswer) const
00841     {
00842         if (alwaysAnswer)
00843         {
00844             getNearestPageIndicesUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, x, z);
00845             return true;
00846         }
00847         else
00848                 {
00849             return getRealPageIndicesUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, x, z);
00850                 }
00851     }
00852     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00853     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::getRealTileIndicesUnscaled(const Real posx, const Real posz, 
00854                                                                 const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez, 
00855                                                                 unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z) const
00856     {
00857                 // adjust x and z to be local to page
00858         const Real inv_tSize = 1.0f / (mOptions->TileSize - 1);
00859         const int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00860 
00861         int tilex = static_cast< int >((posx - ((pagex * pSize) - mOptions->maxUnScaledX)) * inv_tSize); 
00862         //- mOptions->maxUnScaledX
00863 
00864         int tilez = static_cast< int >((posz - ((pagez * pSize) - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ)) * inv_tSize);
00865         //- mOptions->maxUnScaledZ
00866 
00867         const int tilesPerPage = static_cast< int >((pSize * inv_tSize) - 1);
00868 
00869         if (tilex > tilesPerPage || tilex < 0 || tilez > tilesPerPage || tilez < 0)
00870                 {
00871             return false;
00872                 }
00873         else
00874         {
00875             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilex);
00876             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilez);
00877             return true;
00878         }
00879     }
00880 
00881     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00882     void PagingLandScapePageManager::getNearestTileIndicesUnscaled(const Real posx, const Real posz, 
00883                                                                     const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez, 
00884                                                                     unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z) const
00885     {
00886         // adjust x and z to be local to page
00887         const Real inv_tSize = 1.0f / (mOptions->TileSize - 1);
00888         const int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
00889 
00890         const int tilex = static_cast< int >((posx - ((pagex * pSize) - mOptions->maxUnScaledX)) * inv_tSize); 
00891         //- mOptions->maxUnScaledX
00892 
00893         const int tilez = static_cast< int >((posz - ((pagez * pSize) - mOptions->maxUnScaledZ)) * inv_tSize);
00894         //- mOptions->maxUnScaledZ
00895 
00896         const int tilesPerPage = static_cast< int >((pSize * inv_tSize) - 1);
00897 
00898         if (tilex > tilesPerPage)
00899                 {
00900             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilesPerPage);
00901                 }
00902         else if (tilex < 0)
00903                 {
00904             x = 0;
00905                 }
00906         else
00907                 {
00908             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilex);
00909                 }
00910 
00911         if (tilez > tilesPerPage)
00912                 {
00913             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilesPerPage);
00914                 }
00915         else if(tilez < 0)
00916                 {
00917             z = 0;
00918                 }
00919         else
00920                 {
00921             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilez);
00922                 }
00923     }
00924     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00925     bool PagingLandScapePageManager::getTileIndices(const Real posx, const Real posz, 
00926                                                     const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez, 
00927                                                     unsigned int& x, unsigned int& z, bool alwaysAnswer) const
00928     {
00929         if (alwaysAnswer)
00930         {
00931             getNearestTileIndicesUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, pagex, pagez, x, z);
00932             return true;
00933         }
00934         else
00935         {
00936             return getRealTileIndicesUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, pagex, pagez, x, z);
00937         }
00938     }
00939     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00940     PagingLandScapeTile* PagingLandScapePageManager::getTileUnscaled(const Real posx, const Real posz, const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez, bool alwaysAnswer)
00941     {
00942         unsigned int tilex, tilez;
00943         if (alwaysAnswer)
00944         {
00945             getNearestTileIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez, tilex, tilez);
00946                         PagingLandScapePage * const p = getPage (pagex , pagez, false);
00947                         if (p)
00948                                 return p->getTile(tilex, tilez);
00949         }
00950         else
00951         {
00952             if (getRealTileIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez, tilex, tilez))
00953                         {
00954                                 PagingLandScapePage * const p = getPage (pagex , pagez, false);
00955                                 if (p)
00956                                         return p->getTile(tilex, tilez);
00957                         }
00958                 }
00959                 return 0;
00960     }
00961     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00962     PagingLandScapeTile* PagingLandScapePageManager::getTile(const Real posx, const Real posz, const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez, bool alwaysAnswer)
00963     {
00964        return getTileUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, pagex, pagez, alwaysAnswer);
00965     }
00966     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00967     PagingLandScapeTile* PagingLandScapePageManager::getTile(const Real posx, const Real posz, bool alwaysAnswer)
00968     {
00969         return getTileUnscaled(posx / mOptions->scale.x, posz / mOptions->scale.z, alwaysAnswer);
00970     }
00971     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00972     PagingLandScapeTile* PagingLandScapePageManager::getTileUnscaled(const Real posx, const Real posz, bool alwaysAnswer)
00973     {
00974         unsigned int pagex, pagez;
00975         if (alwaysAnswer)
00976         {
00977             unsigned int tilex, tilez;
00978             getNearestPageIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez);
00979             getNearestTileIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez, tilex, tilez);
00980                         return getPage (pagex , pagez)->getTile(tilex, tilez);
00981         }
00982         else
00983         {
00984             if (getRealPageIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez))
00985             {
00986                 unsigned int tilex, tilez;
00987                 if (getRealTileIndicesUnscaled(posx, posz, pagex, pagez, tilex, tilez))
00988                                 {
00989                                         PagingLandScapePage * const p = getPage (pagex , pagez, false);
00990                                         if (p)
00991                                                 return p->getTile(tilex, tilez);
00992                                 }
00993             }        
00994                 }      
00995                 return 0;
00996     }
00997     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00998     PagingLandScapeTile* PagingLandScapePageManager::getTilePage (unsigned int &posx, unsigned int &posz, 
00999                                                                   const unsigned int pagex, const unsigned int pagez)
01000     {        
01001         const Real tSize = mOptions->TileSize - 1;
01002         const Real inv_tSize = 1.0f / tSize;
01003         const int tilex = static_cast< int >(posx * inv_tSize); 
01004         const int tilez = static_cast< int >(posz * inv_tSize);
01005 
01006         const int pSize = mOptions->PageSize - 1;
01007         const int tilesPerPage = static_cast< int > (mOptions->NumTiles - 1);
01008 
01009         unsigned int x;
01010         if (tilex > tilesPerPage)
01011                 {
01012             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilesPerPage);
01013                 }
01014         else if (tilex < 0)
01015                 {
01016             x = 0;
01017                 }
01018         else
01019                 {
01020             x = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilex);
01021                 }
01022 
01023         unsigned int z;
01024         if (tilez > tilesPerPage)
01025                 {
01026             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilesPerPage);
01027                 }
01028         else if(tilez < 0)
01029                 {
01030             z = 0;
01031                 }
01032         else
01033                 {
01034             z = static_cast< unsigned int >(tilez);
01035                 }
01036         posx = posx - static_cast< unsigned int > (x * tSize);
01037                 posz = posz - static_cast< unsigned int > (z * tSize);
01038                 PagingLandScapePage *p = getPage (pagex , pagez);
01039                 if (p)
01040                         return p->getTile(x, z);
01041                 return 0;
01042     }
01043     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
01044         void PagingLandScapePageManager::setWorldGeometryRenderQueue(RenderQueueGroupID qid)
01045         {
01046         mRenderQueueGroupID = qid;
01047         PagingLandScapePageList::iterator l, lend = mLoadedPages.end();
01048         for (l = mLoadedPages.begin(); l != lend; ++l)
01049         {
01050             PagingLandScapePage *p = (*l);
01051             {
01052                 p->setRenderQueue(qid);
01053             }
01054         }
01055         }
